blogPost.excerpt: Sook empowers you to create a fully customised store, book by the hour and get detailed footfall analytics after your event. Simply drag & drop your digital content onto the walls of your virtual store and it comes to life as soon as your booking begins.
blogPost.body: Sook empowers you to create a fully customised store, book by the hour and get detailed footfall analytics after your event. Simply drag & drop your digital content onto the walls of your virtual store and it comes to life as soon as your booking begins.
blogPost.title: Sook Store Builder - Retail space as a service, by the hour, with video-walls!
blogPost.author: Sarel van Baalen

localize.description: Sook使您能够创建一个完全定制的商店，按小时预订，并在活动结束后获得详细的人流分析。只需简单地将您的数字内容拖放到虚拟商店的墙壁上，它就会在您的预订开始后立即变成现实。
localize.tagline: 零售空间作为一种服务，按小时计算，有视频墙!

localize.description: Sook使您能夠創建一個完全定製的商店，按小時預訂，並在活動結束後獲得詳細的人流分析。只需簡單地將您的數字內容拖放到虛擬商店的牆壁上，它就會在您的預訂開始後立即變成現實。
localize.tagline: 零售空間作爲一種服務，按小時計算，有視頻牆!

previous.excerpt: It's been a long 2020, eh? 🥵 Sometimes, thanking someone for going above and beyond their ways to help you is not enough. Send them a "kudos" in a public Slack channel to share their awesomeness with everyone and spread a bit of positivity. 🚀
previous.title: Kudosbot - Your friendly neighbourhood kudos spreader.

localize.description: 这是一个漫长的2020年，嗯？🥵 有时候，感谢一个人对你的帮助是远远不够的。在公共Slack频道里给他们发个 "赞"，和大家一起分享他们的精彩，传播一点正能量。🚀
localize.tagline: 你的友好邻居的赞誉传播者。

localize.description: 這是一個漫長的2020年，嗯？🥵 有時候，感謝一個人對你的幫助是遠遠不夠的。在公共Slack頻道里給他們發個 "贊"，和大家一起分享他們的精彩，傳播一點正能量。🚀
localize.tagline: 你的友好鄰居的讚譽傳播者。

next.excerpt: Storetasker matches you to a trusted Shopify Expert within a few hours for projects big and small. We've interviewed over 5,000 developers, hand selected the top 5%, and streamlined the experience from end to end.
next.title: Storetasker 2.0 - Where Shopify brands meet their developer

localize.description: Storetasker 会在几小时内为您匹配到值得信赖的 Shopify 专家，为您提供大大小小的项目。我们已经采访了超过5000名开发人员，亲自挑选了前5%的开发人员，并从头到尾简化了体验。
localize.tagline: Shopify品牌在哪里遇到他们的开发者

localize.description: Storetasker 會在幾小時內爲您匹配到值得信賴的 Shopify 專家，爲您提供大大小小的項目。我們已經採訪了超過5000名開發人員，親自挑選了前5%的開發人員，並從頭到尾簡化了體驗。
localize.tagline: Shopify品牌在哪裏遇到他們的開發者
